attribute.description: General theme, one of: beige, black, blood, league, moon, night, serif, simple, sky, solarized, white (default: white)
attribute.name: theme

attribute.description: Display controls in the bottom right corner (default: true)
attribute.name: controls

attribute.description: Display a presentation progress bar (default: true)
attribute.name: progress

attribute.description: Display the page number of the current slide (default: false)
attribute.name: slideNumber

attribute.description: Push each slide change to the browser history (default: false)
attribute.name: history

attribute.description: Enable keyboard shortcuts for navigation (default: true)
attribute.name: keyboard

attribute.description: Enable the slide overview mode (default: true)
attribute.name: overview

attribute.description: Vertical centering of slides (default: true)
attribute.name: center

attribute.description: Enables touch navigation on devices with touch input (default: true)
attribute.name: touch

attribute.description: Loop the presentation (default: false)
attribute.name: loop

attribute.description: Change the presentation direction to be RTL (default: false)
attribute.name: rtl

attribute.description: Randomizes the order of slides each time the presentation loads (default: false)
attribute.name: shuffle

attribute.description: Turns fragments on and off globally (default: true)
attribute.name: fragments

attribute.description: Flags if the presentation is running in an embedded mode, i.e. contained within a limited portion of the screen (default: false)
attribute.name: embedded

attribute.description: Flags if we should show a help overlay when the questionmark key is pressed (default: true)
attribute.name: help

attribute.description: Flags if speaker notes should be visible to all viewers (default: false)
attribute.name: showNotes

attribute.description: Number of milliseconds between automatically proceeding to the next slide, disabled when set to 0, this value can be overwritten by using a data-autoslide attribute on your slides (default: 0)
attribute.name: autoSlide

attribute.description: Stop auto-sliding after user input (default: true)
attribute.name: autoSlideStoppable

attribute.description: Use this method for navigation when auto-sliding (default: Reveal.navigateNext)
attribute.name: autoSlideMethod

attribute.description: Enable slide navigation via mouse wheel (default: false)
attribute.name: mouseWheel

attribute.description: Hides the address bar on mobile devices (default: true)
attribute.name: hideAddressBar

attribute.description: Opens links in an iframe preview overlay (default: false)
attribute.name: previewLinks

attribute.description: Transition style, one of: none, default, fade, slide, convex, concave, zoom (default: default)
attribute.name: transition

attribute.description: Transition speed, one of: default, fast, slow (default: default)
attribute.name: transitionSpeed

attribute.description: Transition style for full page slide backgrounds, one of: none, default, fade, slide, convex, concave, zoom (default: default)
attribute.name: backgroundTransition

attribute.description: Number of slides away from the current that are visible (default: 3)
attribute.name: viewDistance

attribute.description: Parallax background image, e.g. https://s3.amazonaws.com/hakim-static/reveal-js/reveal-parallax-1.jpg (default: {empty string})
attribute.name: parallaxBackgroundImage

attribute.description: Parallax background size, CSS syntax, e.g.'2100px 900px' (default: {empty string})
attribute.name: parallaxBackgroundSize

attribute.description: Number of pixels to move the parallax background per slide -Calculated automatically unless specified- Set to 0 to disable movement along horizontal axis (default: 0)
attribute.name: parallaxBackgroundHorizontal

attribute.description: Number of pixels to move the parallax background per slide -Calculated automatically unless specified- Set to 0 to disable movement along vertical axis (default: 0)
attribute.name: parallaxBackgroundVertical
